game

Class Turn

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • game.Turn

  • public class Turn
extends java.util.Observable
    The class represents the turn. During a turn the assignPlayer have the choice to do several moves or to make an swapRequest. A move can only be added to the turn if the move is according to the game rules.
    Author:
    Jonathan Juursema & Peter Wessels

      • removeMove

        public void removeMove(Move move)
                throws SquareOutOfBoundsException
        Removes a move from the turn and updates the copy of the board accordingly.
        Parameters:
        move - The move that needs to be removed.
        Throws:
        SquareOutOfBoundsException - Is thrown when the given BoardSquare cannot be found on the board.

      • addSwapRequest

        public void addSwapRequest(Tile t)
                    throws IllegalTurnException
        Add a swap request to the turn.
        Parameters:
        swap - object with the tiles that needs to be swapped.
        Throws:
        IllegalTurnException

      • removeSwapRequest

        public void removeSwapRequest(Tile t)
                       throws IllegalTurnException
        Removes swap request from the turn. Important to notice that the tile is not automatically added to the hand, yet.
        Parameters:
        t - The tile that needs to be removed.
        Throws:
        IllegalTurnException - If tile is not in the turn. TODO: Make exception more specific

      • getSequencesByMovesAndBoard

        public static java.util.Map<Move,java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.util.List<Tile>>> getSequencesByMovesAndBoard(Board board,
                                                                                                                    java.util.List<Move> moves)
                                                                                                             throws SquareOutOfBoundsException,
                                                                                                                    IllegalMoveException
        This function maps the rows or columns that are affiliated with the applied moves. These sequences are the basis of the check whether a sequence is valid and is the basis of the calculation of the score.
        Returns:
        A map with each move mapped to the tiles in te same row and coloumn.
        Throws:
        SquareOutOfBoundsException - Thrown if the BoardSquare not exists
        IllegalMoveException

      • calculateScore

        public int calculateScore()
                   throws SquareOutOfBoundsException,
                          IllegalMoveException
        The function getScore() calculates the score of the current turn according to the game rules. First will determined if the moves form a row or a column. Of each tile the corresponding neighbours (in case of a row, the columns and viceversa) will be counted.
        Returns:
        The score of the whole turn.
        Throws:
        SquareOutOfBoundsException
        IllegalMoveException

      • applyTurn

        public java.util.List<Tile> applyTurn(Board board,
                                      Bag bag)
                               throws TooFewTilesInBagException,
                                      TileNotInBagException,
                                      TooManyTilesInBag,
                                      TileNotInHandException,
                                      IllegalTurnException,
                                      SquareOutOfBoundsException,
                                      HandLimitReachedExeption
        This function will apply the current turn to a specified board.
        Parameters:
        board - The board to which the turn should be applied.
        bag - The bag which this turn uses.
        Returns:
        The list of tiles the player gets back from the bag.
        Throws:
        TileNotInHandException
        TooManyTilesInBag
        TileNotInBagException
        TooFewTilesInBagException
        IllegalTurnException
        SquareOutOfBoundsException
        HandLimitReachedExeption

      • getSwap

        public java.util.List<Tile> getSwap()
        Returns the tiles that are added as a swap request.
        Returns:
        The list of tiles that are contained in the list.

      • isSwapRequest

        public boolean isSwapRequest()
        Returns whether this turn is a swap request or not.
        Returns:
        True if the turn contains any tiles to swap.

      • isMoveRequest

        public boolean isMoveRequest()
        Returns whether this turn contained any moves.

      • getBoardCopy

        public Board getBoardCopy()
        Get the representation of the board of current turn. This board also contains any moves applied to the board.
